name: card.01
title: Intelligent Rodents
rules1: When you rant, draw an extra card, and then discard a card.
rules2: Before you graverob, you may discard the top card of the deck to the graveyard.

name: card.02
title: Brain in a Jar
rules1: +1 max handsize.
rules2: You may draw after playing a wild role.

name: card.03
title: Glowy green things
rules1: Your metal gadgets (finished and unfinished) are worth +1 infamy each.
rules2: You may add a single chemical material to any gadget you are building.

name: card.04
title: Humanoid Cat
rules1: You may also hypnotize 1 card from your hand when hypnotizing.
rules2: +2 max minions.

name: card.05
title: Vampire-Pepper
rules1: Your finished gadgets may horde +1 card each.
rules2: You may also use 1 material from your hand when graverobbing.

name: card.06
title: Gravity Engine
rules1: All your minions count as Craftsmen. you may build this with any type of material.
rules2: +3 infamy. you may build this with any type of material.

name: card.07
title: Temporal Clacker
rules1: Your unfinished metal gadgets still provide you with infamy.
rules2: When you finish this, you may immediately craft and/or graverob once per infamy.

name: card.08
title: Nefarious Turbine
rules1: You also may hypnotize 1 minion from the top of the deck when hypnotizing. +2 max minions.
rules2: Your metal gadgets require one fewer materials to complete.

name: card.09
title: Birdbath
rules1: Before you craft, draw a card. you may add one additional card to a gadget during the craft.
rules2: -1 infamy. At the start of your turn, you may draw two cards.

name: card.10
title: Abstract Device
rules1: You may tuck an extra card from the graveyard when you tinker.
rules2: At the end of your turn if the top card of the deck's infamy matches the number of cards in your hand, hypnotize it.

name: card.11
title: Ionization Engine
rules1: You may rant after any turn during which you tinkered or hypnotized.
rules2: When you gain a minion, you may take a card matching that minion's type from the graveyard or draw a card.

name: card.12
title: Baghdad Capacitor
rules1: You may also add 1 material from the graveyard to the gadget you are building each time you craft.
rules2: When you start building this, you may tuck an electrical card under it from the graveyard if one exists.

name: card.13
title: Antimemetic Weapon
rules1: You may discard any number of cards before ranting.
rules2: When you finish this, you may swap it with the top card of the deck or a card in the graveyard.

name: card.14
title: Seven Minute Boots
rules1: At the end of each of your turns, you may Rant.
rules2: Your Craftsman and tinkerer minions may perform their actions three times each when you lead or follow their role.

name: card.15
title: AutoCrammer
rules1: Your hypnotist minions count as every role.
rules2: After you Rant, you may draw four additional cards. If you do, discard this.

name: card.16
title: Death Ray
rules1: You may discard a minion to the graveyard to perform its action three times when you would normally perform it once.
rules2: Once this is finished, you may end the game at the start of any of your turns. Score as usual.

name: card.17
title: Kinetic Accumulator
rules1: When the game ends, gain 1 infamy per minion you have.
rules2: Your gadgets require one fewer materials to finish.

name: card.18
title: Chronometric Coupler
rules1: After you finish this, tuck every card in your hand under gadgets you own face down (if possible).
rules2: When you follow, you may return cards from the graveyard of the same role to perform the same action that many times.

name: card.19
title: Dr. Doom Device
rules1: If you have 4 gadgets of the same type of material at any time, you win.
rules2: If you start your turn with one minion of each role, you win.

name: card.20
title: Spatial Anomalizer
rules1: Your opponents may not rant during your turn.
rules2: At the end of the game, select a material. You may count any of the cards in your hand as that material for scoring purposes.

name: card.21
title: Zombie Cannon
rules1: When you torture, you may also tuck a card from the graveyard.
rules2: When you finish this, exchange a tucked card for a gadget of the same total infamy.

name: card.22
title: Revivification Matrix
rules1: When you graverob, you may steal a tucked card from an opponent instead of a card from the graveyard.
rules2: When you torture, if you add a card to an uncompleted gadget, complete it.

name: card.23
title: Collapsing Gun
rules1: +1 infamy. You may Hypnotize your opponent's minions if they have more minions than you.
rules2: When you torture, also tuck the top card from the deck if possible.

name: card.24
title: Bone Teleportation Network
rules1: After you finish this, tuck every card from the graveyard under gadgets you own face down (if possible).
rules2: After you torture, you may steal a face-down tucked card from an opponent who has more tucked cards than you and tuck it.

name: card.25
title: Trenchcoat Generator
rules1: When your opponent plays a wild role, you may rant.
rules2: You are immune to torture.

name: card.26
title: Pollution Amplifier
rules1: When you take an action, select one of your opponent's minions to use. your opponent may not use that minion this turn.
rules2: Gain +3 infamy per minion if you have the fewest minions.

name: card.27
title: Tissue Disruptor
rules1: +1 infamy. After you finish this, you may swap a gadget with an opponent that has more gadgets than you.
rules2: Instead of discarding the role you select, you may tuck it face down under an incomplete gadget.
